docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N.Y., March 9--Following is a summary of the major decisions taken at the eleventh session of the General Assembly, which adjourned yesterday subject to recall for further action on the Middle East and Hungarian questions:

docs.snippet: Five years ago today Gen. Fulgencio Batista seized power in Cuba by a daring garrison revolt outside Havana. It was one of the most unfortunate deeds in the history of the Cuban Republic, then just fifty years old.
docs.lead_paragraph: Five years ago today Gen. Fulgencio Batista seized power in Cuba by a daring garrison revolt outside Havana. It was one of the most unfortunate deeds in the history of the Cuban Republic, then just fifty years old.

docs.snippet: MADRID, March 15--A senior Spanish official has published a stinging criticism of the "inadequacy" of United States aid to Spain.

docs.snippet: ST. PETERSBURG, Fla., March 15 (AP)--Jackie Burke Jr., a Texan, fired a 3-under-par 68 today and led by one stroke at the midway mark of the St. Petersburg open golf tournament.
docs.lead_paragraph: ST. PETERSBURG, Fla., March 15 (AP)--Jackie Burke Jr., a Texan, fired a 3-under-par 68 today and led by one stroke at the midway mark of the St. Petersburg open golf tournament.
